alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 4:53AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Pockets of freezing fog possible in southern Lander/Eureka county this morning... Satellite imagery and Nevada Department of Transportation webcams are picking up locally dense freezing fog in the Austin area, as well as along US Highway 50 from New Pass Summit east to Pinto Summit in Eureka county. Visibility as low as one-half mile or less will be possible in the dense freezing fog, as well as patchy black ice on roadways. If driving this morning, please use caution. Drive at lower speeds and use low beams when possible. The freezing fog is expected to lift after 8am this morning. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
